question: where does us highway 1 start and end
api_result: U.S. Highway 1 (US 1) is a major north-south U.S. Highway that serves the East Coast of the United States. It starts in Key West, Florida, and ends in Fort Kent, Maine, at the Canadian border. This makes it one of the longest north-south highways in the United States, stretching over 2,000 miles and passing through many major cities including Miami, Washington, D.C., Baltimore, Philadelphia, New York City, and Boston.
